title: Implement tsk close and delete in Rust
description: Implement close and delete commands in Rust.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement tsk close and delete in Rust. Acceptance: close sets status closed and closed_at, delete removes file, missing issue errors, and steps for issue_close_delete.feature.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement tsk close and tsk delete in Rust mirroring Python. Acceptance: close transitions to closed with closed_at, delete removes file, missing issue errors, and CLI commands.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk close/delete with helpers and CLI wiring. Ran: cd rust && cargo test

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust close/delete workflows and CLI commands. Ran: cd rust && cargo test; python tools/check_spec_parity.py
